title: Understanding Label Controls
text: Label controls are used in user interfaces to provide information to users. They are not interactive elements but serve as static text or images.

title: Purpose of Label Controls
text: Label controls are primarily used to display text or images that convey information to the user. They do not perform actions or receive input.

hintAnswer: to impart information in a user interface
title: Identifying the Correct Use of Label Controls
text: Which of the following is the correct use of a label control?
choices: to impart information in a user interface
to add a label to the sheet
